Reviews.Title: Fantastic Laptop!
Reviews.Author: Doug
Reviews.Content: I just received my new laptop today and am very pleased with the added features, found nowhere else. My laptop arrived exactly as promised. Eluktronics was very helpful and quick in answering my pre-purchase questions ~ very professional. I could not be happier.

ProductInfo.Features:
2.4GHz/3.4GHz Quad Core Intel Core i7 Haswell CPU, Windows 8.1 64-Bit
17.3" Touch Screen Display (1920 x 1080p); Microsoft Home & Student 2013
240GB Solid State Performance, Dual 1TB Hard Drives, 16GB DDR3L RAM
2GB (2048MB) NVIDIA GeForce GT 740M Dedicated Graphics, Blu-Ray Writer
Backlit Keyboard, Beats Audio, HDMI, WiFi-N 2x2 Dual Band, 2 Year HP Warranty
ProductInfo.Name: HP ENVY TouchSmart 17t-j100 Fully Loaded Quad Edition Notebook PC (EXTREME PERFORMANCE & STORAGE) Office 2013 Home & Student Suite
